_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

CallForTenders.description: A document used by a Contracting Party to define a procurement project to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.

CallForTenders.title: Call For Tenders. Details
CallForTenders.description: A document used by a Contracting Party to define a procurement project to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Call For Tenders. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Call For Tenders. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Call For Tenders. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Call For Tenders. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Call For Tenders. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Call For Tenders. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Call For Tenders. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Call For Tenders. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

ApprovalDate.title: Call For Tenders. Approval Date. Date
ApprovalDate.description: The date, assigned by the contracting party, on which the Call For Tenders was approved.

IssueDate.title: Call For Tenders. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Call For Tenders. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Call For Tenders. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Call For Tenders. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Indicates the current version of the Call for Tenders.

PreviousVersionID.title: Call For Tenders. Previous_ Version. Identifier
PreviousVersionID.description: Identifies the previous version of the Call for Tenders which is superceded by this version.

LegalDocumentReference.title: Call For Tenders. Legal_ Document Reference. Document Reference
LegalDocumentReference.description: A reference to a legal document.

TechnicalDocumentReference.title: Call For Tenders. Technical_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TechnicalDocumentReference.description: A reference to a technical document.

RequiredDocumentReference.title: Call For Tenders. Required_ Document Reference. Document Reference
RequiredDocumentReference.description: A reference to a required document.

ProvidedDocumentReference.title: Call For Tenders. Provided_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ProvidedDocumentReference.description: A reference to a provided document.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Call For Tenders. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Call For Tenders. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

ContractingParty.title: Call For Tenders. Contracting Party
ContractingParty.description: The contracting party or parties in case of joint procurement.

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Call For Tenders. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

ReceiverParty.title: Call For Tenders. Receiver_ Party. Party

TenderingTerms.title: Call For Tenders. Tendering Terms
TenderingTerms.description: The tendering terms associated with this tendering process.

TenderingProcess.title: Call For Tenders. Tendering Process
TenderingProcess.description: A description of the tendering process itself.

ProcurementProject.title: Call For Tenders. Procurement Project
ProcurementProject.description: An overall definition of this procurement project.

ProcurementProjectLot.title: Call For Tenders. Procurement Project Lot
ProcurementProjectLot.description: One of the procurement project lots into which this contract can be split.
